notes.note: Version 1.0 is single player, 2.0 is Dukematch only.
Replaces episode 1 levels 1, 2, 5 & 7, and episode 2 level 1.
Maps are missing a large number of textures.
Doesn't appear to work with the latest version of eDuke32.

Super Nukem Bros. - A Super Mario Bros. Tribute

notes.note: Liquidator is an obscure Russian game illegally made using the Build Engine which was published in 1998 by Alex & Aigo of the Akella Company.
The game logic & data has been partially translated to English and converted to work with the original version of Duke Nukem 3D by fgsfds.
